title: Vitry-Le-François train bombing
what: Bomb attack on a Strasbourg–Paris train

title: Piazza Fontana bombing
what: A bomb exploded at the headquarters of Banca Nazionale dell'Agricoltura (National Agrarian Bank) in Piazza Fontana

title: Italicus Express bombing
what: Bombing in Italy on a train of the public rail network.

title: Bologna massacre
what: A terrorist bombing of the Central Station at Bologna (Italy)

title: Oktoberfest bombing
what: An explosion of an improvised explosive device at the main entrance of the Oktoberfest

title: Malmö shootings
what: A series of attacks in the southern Swedish city of Malmö between December 2009 and October 2010

title: Oktober book shop bombing
what: Bombing of Oktober book shop in Tromsø

title: Labor day parade bombing
what: A bomb was thrown into the parade right outside of the Conservarive party og norway's headquarter

title: Bombing of Regjeringskvartalet
what: Bombing of Regjeringskvartalet i Oslo city center - the executive government quarter of Norway

title: Attacks on Utøya
what: Attack on youth summer camp on Utøya island

title: Nor mosque bombing
what: Bombing of mosque at Frogner (Oslo). One woman was hurt.

title: Handeland killings
what: Two men was killed on a bridge in Lunner municipality

title: The Holmlia killing
what: The 15 year old boy Benjamin Hermansen was killed.
